1. ﻿[0476]
2. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x124][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x12D][OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]What are Dragons, anyway?
3. Where do they come from?[A]
4. What are they here for?[A]
5. [OpenMidRight]...I don't know...[A]
6. I don't know... anything specific...[A]
7. [OpenMidLeft]Hm... I see.[A]
8. You don't know anything about the
9. Dragons, but you have their blood[A]
10. in you.[A]
11. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
12. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]If you were a normal girl, you could
13. lead an ordinary life, not having[A]
14. people hunt you down for your power...[A]
15. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
16. [ToggleMouthMove]I... This is me...[A]
17. Even the Dragon blood that flows in
18. me... it is what makes me who I am...[A]
19. [OpenMidLeft]I see... you're right.[A]
20. [ToggleSmile]You are a strong one.[A]
21. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Me... strong...?[A]
22. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Yes, you're strong.[A]
23. You really are just like me
24. when I was your age.[A]
25. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]I... I see...[A]
26. [0477]
27. [OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x125][OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x12D][OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Hey, you over there![A]
28. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
29. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]Hey![A]
30. Can you not hear me,
31. or are you just ignoring me?[A]
32. [OpenMidLeft]...Uh...
33. ...Me?[A]
34. [OpenMidRight]Is there anyone else here?[A]
35. Geez, are you deaf, or just
36. plain stupid?[A]
37. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
38. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove][ToggleSmile]Anyway, I heard you use ancient
39. dark magic.[A]
40. Is it true?[A]
41. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
42. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]Let me see your spell books.
43. I don't think I've ever seen...[A][MoveMidRight]
44. [ToggleSmile]Ow![A]
45. What the...[A]
46. Did you just do that?[A]
47. [OpenMidLeft]...Please... don't touch...
48. me...[A]
49. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]...Well, well...
50. You dare stand up to me?[A]
51. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
52. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]Ah, fine.
53. I'll leave you alone for now.[A]
54. But you're showing me that
55. spell book next time we meet![A][ClearFace]
56. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
57. [0478]
58. [OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x125][.......][OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x12D][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
59. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove][ToggleSmile]? Whoa!?[A]
60. Y-You!?
61. Damn, how could I not have
62. noticed you coming so close...[A]
63. Wh-What do you want!?[A]
64. Are you trying to pay me
65. back for the other day?[A]
66. [OpenMidLeft]...Here...[A]
67. [OpenMidRight]The dark magic book![A]
68. The one they don't know even
69. exists...[A]
70. [OpenMidLeft]...Yes...
71. ...You know much...[A]
72. [OpenMidRight]Of course I do![A]
73. Do you have any idea how long
74. I've been looking for this!?[A]
75. [ToggleSmile]So this is it...[A]
76. Wow...
77. I can feel it's power...![A]
78. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...Do you want it...?[A]
79. [OpenMidRight]I can have it!?
80. But... are you sure?[A]
81. Don't you need it as well?
82. Why give it to me?[A]
83. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[ToggleMouthMove][A][ClearFace]
84. [OpenMidRight]Hey, wait! Hey![A]
85. [0479]
86. [OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x125][OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x12D][OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Hey, you over there!
87. You![A]
88. With the long dragging hair![A]
89. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
90. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]I'm giving this spell book
91. back to you.[A]
92. [OpenMidLeft]...What?
93. ...Why...?[A]
94. [OpenMidRight]I don't need things to be
95. given to me.[A]
96. I'm not a beggar.[A]
97. [OpenMidLeft]...Yes...[A]
98. ...But...
99. I wanted to give it... to you...[A]
100. [OpenMidRight]What?
101. Why?[A]
102. [OpenMidLeft]...Because...
103. You are a good person...[A]
104. [OpenMidRight]Huh?[A]
105. [OpenMidLeft]...You always act strong...[A]
106. ...But... you actually have a kind
107. heart... So... I wanted to give[A]
108. it to you...[A]
109. [OpenMidRight]I have a kind heart!?[A]
110. Only my brother ever said something
111. as ridiculous as that![A]
112. [OpenMidLeft]...I know you... better than you
113. know yourself...[A]
114. [OpenMidRight]...Don't talk like that.
115. You'll scare people off.[A]
116. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[A]
117. [OpenMidRight][ToggleMouthMove]Well, it doesn't bother me, though.[A]
118. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...Thank you...[A][OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]...What's your name?
119. I'm Ray.[A]
120. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]...Ray...[A]

9. building that village.[A]
10. [OpenMidLeft]Oh.[A]

12. recruiting help.[A]

14. [OpenMidRight]Of course![A]

16. [OpenMidLeft]Dance, of course.[A]

18. It makes people feel like getting up
19. and working some more.[A]
20. [OpenMidRight]You think so?[A]
21. Hmm...
22. Well, I can cook, too.[A]
23. You know my Special Stamina...[A]
24. [OpenMidLeft]No way.[A]
25. [OpenMidRight]W-What?[A]
26. [OpenMidLeft]Ever since I started the rebellion,
27. I've been eating your...[A]
28. I can't even bear to say it in
29. words.[A]
30. Anyway, I wouldn't call it food.[A]
31. [OpenMidRight]I never!
32. I've always been trying...[A]
33. [OpenMidLeft]Look, Lalam.[A]
34. You usually don't end up burning
35. the house down when you cook a[A]
36. proper meal.[A]
37. [OpenMidRight]That's not a big loss, considering
38. how well my food tastes.[A]
39. [OpenMidLeft]The wails and moans of the rebel leaders...
40. I can still hear them echoing in my ears.[A]
41. Has Elphin ever eaten it?[A]
42. [OpenMidRight]Yeah.
43. But he didn't say anything.[A]
44. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleMouthMove]......[ToggleMouthMove][A]
45. [OpenMidRight]You see?[A]
46. There's something wrong with everyone
47. else's taste buds.[A]
48. My food was probably too high-
49. class for them.[A]
50. Maybe...[A]
51. Roy might appreciate my fine
52. taste.[A]
53. Yes![A]
54. I'm sorry, Echidna.[A]
55. I have to make Roy try my cooking![A][ClearFace]
56. [OpenMidLeft]...I'm sorry, Roy...[A]
57. [047B]
58. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x133][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x126][OpenMidRight]Oh, Echidna.[A]
59. [OpenMidLeft]Lalam.
60. Hey...[A]
61. You were talking about feeding
62. that stuff to Roy, but...[A]
63. did you really do it?[A]
64. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]What's that supposed to mean!?
65. He praised me![A]
66. He said that it was really...[Clear]
67. uh...that it looked really good.[A]
68. [OpenMidLeft]So he ate it, huh?
69. [ToggleSmile]When's the funeral?[A]
70. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]Hmph![A]
71. I just wasn't doing too well that
72. day!
73. My stepfather always said that
74. he loved my cooking.[A]
75. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Now, now, even if you can't cook, your
76. dancing is still the best in the world.[A]
77. I should be working hard, too, to let
78. the people live in peace.[A]
79. [OpenMidRight]...You know,
80. you're really noble.[A]
81. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]W-What?[A]
82. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]You're always thinking about others.[A]
83. Even this, building a village so that
84. other people can live in peace.[A]
85. [OpenMidLeft]I...[A]
86. [OpenMidRight]You're like those heroes that appear
87. in the sagas that bards sing![A]
88. You appear, help the needy, and leave
89. as suddenly as you had come...[A]
90. You're also mysterious since you never
91. tell anybody about yourself.[A]
92. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Right...I don't.[A]
93. [OpenMidRight][ToggleSmile]But I won't ask.[A]
94. I'm really curious, but there must be
95. an important reason why you won't[A]
96. tell us.[A]
97. [047C]
98. [OpenMidLeft][LoadFace][0x133][OpenMidRight][LoadFace][0x126][OpenMidRight]Hey, Echidna![A]
99. [OpenMidLeft]Yeah?[A]
100. [OpenMidRight]I just had a really
101. great idea![A]
102. [OpenMidLeft]What is it?[A]
103. [OpenMidRight]Do you want to hear it?[A]
104. [OpenMidLeft]Well, yeah.[A]
105. [OpenMidRight]Are you sure?[A]
106. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Yes, I'm sure.
107. [ToggleSmile]Come on, let's hear it.[A]
108. [OpenMidRight]Okay.[A]
109. I was thinking, when the village is
110. done, let's put a statue there.[A]
111. [OpenMidLeft]A statue?[A]
112. [OpenMidRight]A statue of you![A]
113. It can have an engraving that says,
114. 'A great hero lies here...'[A]
115. or something like that.[A]
116. [OpenMidLeft][ToggleSmile]Hey, hey,
117. I don't plan on dying yet.[A]
118. [OpenMidRight]Anyway, it's your village, so there
119. has to be a statue of you somewhere.[A]
120. Make sure you think of a pose for it.[A][ClearFace]
